00384A4E.VoiceDir5.D5166: Disappointed by Player's ignorance. Wearily answers who they used to be.

5D45F11D.Line1.D5166: Just take a look around. Those who aren't wounded are either deployed or missing.

6643D0CC.VoiceDir3.D5166: A glimpse of pride. He cares for the Iron Wolves deeply.

912EE421.Line5.D5166: (sigh) We were famous, not long ago. Honorable mercenaries who served the innocent and made the wicked pay, but these days...

F73A6A9F.Line3.D5166: But they don't give up...not one of them.
